desc: How to clean out warmer trays? Never again! Flippins eliminate the hassle of cleaning out your trays, leaving your warmers looking new & you Flippin Happy!

layout.text: Soon You'll Know: This Is What Happiness Smells Like
Easy. Mess-free. Clean premium scents. Wax melting has never been this fun before. Discover the full Flippin' Happy home scent experience.
